sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: REMUS, the brother of Romulus, was expofed together with his brother -by the cruelty of his grandfather. In the conteſt which happened between the two brothers about building a city, Romulus obtained the preference, and Remus, for ridiculing the rising walls, was put to death by bis brother’s orders, or by Romulus himſelf (ſee Romulus). The Romans were afflicted with a plague after this murder; upon which the oracle was conſulted, and the manes of Remus appeaſed by the inſtitution of the Remuria.
